body:
oh man im so glad I found avicus :D and its been whole frickin year. even though its felt like 3 or 4 its been a great year. :D the best part is that I found avicus from what I thought was a bad thing... I got banned on another server for advertising but some guy asked me what the ip to that server was :P and being my stupid self I gave him it xD but then after that I needed a new walls server. :D well I found wallmc.net (at the time) and ever since this has been the best server ever :D so glad I found it
<3
-micahb222000

title: 1 year!!

replies.body:
Nuu xP you joined on November 44th it hasn't been a year for you yet xD
But, it's still a long ride to get this far!
